name: Spider Solitaire 2018
description:
Spider Solitaire 2018 is one of the best card games free for Android .

Spider Solitaire has a fantastic user interface, beautiful graphics and subtle sound effects.

Drag, tap, or for the most fun, give cards a shove to send them on their way!
If you love Spider solitaire, Spiderette or any other Patience card games, don't miss out on the best Spider Solitaire for your phone and tablet! Just give the game a try, and we promise Spider Solitaire free is the most beautiful and user friendly Spider solitare you've ever played.

★How to play★
◆ Tap to auto move cards
◆ Drag and Drop cards to move to foundation !
◆ 1200 challenging levels to pass through
